Match starts and one player quits. Check 🗸
One Team mate with a 90's mic. Check! 🗸
Voted off for being top of your team. Check! 🗸
Enjoying a 30min cooldown typing this up. Check! 🗸

Do I recommend the game? Of course I do, we never learn!
